jcr:content.jcr:description: Make room for a better trail run or hike in the Altra Lone Peak family. These legendary four styles will keep you comfortable while you tackle any terrain.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Lone Peak Family

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML:
FOUR STYLES.
ONE TRAIL RUNNING LEGACY.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML: MAKE ROOM FOR A BETTER RUN

image.alt: Inside shot in clockwise order: Lone Peak All-Wthr Mid, Lone Peak Hiker, Lone Peak 5, Lone Peak All-Wthr Low

customhtml2.customHTML:
TWO ALTRA ICONS MEET

For the first time, Altra EGO™ midsole foam is coming to the Lone Peak family. Expect all the features that made the Lone Peak a trail icon, now even more responsiveness.

image.alt: Man running in down a desert mountain trail in the Altra Lone Peak 5

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
LONE PEAK 5

Grip. Traction. Comfort. With a MaxTrac™ and TrailClaw™ outsole, the Lone Peak 5 is designed for rugged, unpredictable trail runs. Even the toughest terrain doesn't stand a chance.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
LONE PEAK ALL-WTHR

Go anywhere in any weather with The Lone Peak ALL-WTHR. Available in both low and mid, the ALL-WTHR is built around a water-resistant eVent® weatherproof bootie construction that’s up for the elements—all the elements.

image.alt: Men's Lone Peak ALL-WTHR Mid in Grey/Yellow

customhtml2_copy_cop_16414596.customHTML:
LONE PEAK HIKER

Trail? Check. Town? Check? The versatile Lone Peak Hiker is built for making tracks all over, from city sidewalks to rugged and rocky trails. The grippy DuraTread™ outsole is ready to say “hi” to any hike.

image.alt: Men's Lone Peak Hiker in Khaki

customhtml2_copy_cop_276211913.customHTML:
ALTRA FOOTSHAPE™ COMFORT

Our FootShape™ comfort gives your toes more room to spread out naturally and is designed to address biological differences in men's and women's feet. FootShape™ comfort: find it in every shoe, feel it in every step.

image.alt: Top of shoes, from left to right: Lone Peak ALL-WTHR Low, Lone Peak ALL-WTHR Mid, Lone Peak Hiker, Lone Peak 5
